name: Coming Soon Page & Maintenance Mode
author: wpshopmart

sections.description:
Coming Soon Plugin or Maintenance Mode which will manage your upcoming Launching of website & site offline page. Responsive Coming Soon plugin is provide you creative and well-crafted Coming soon page & Maintenance Mode Page. This is a creative, modern, easy to customize, professional, and responsive WORDPRESS coming soon Plugin with clean organized code. Whether your site is under construction or under Maintenance Mode or in site offline mode this plugin will help you in every situation quickly.

Our Coming Soon plugin contains many useful resources including an ajax subscription form and some awesome icons. Suitable for any creative agency. Responsive Coming Soon plugin is help you easy create coming soon or maintain page With powerfull panel, you can change all colors, font sizes and you can add more section to show up information about your company (ex: About us, What we do, conatc info like social inks number etc..).

Check Demo

  • Responsive Coming Soon

Coming Soon Pro
This is the lite version of the coming soon Pro plugin. Pro plugin comes with more features like 8+ email newsletters , access settings, 8 premium retain ready design templates and tons more. Click here to purchase the best coming soon pro plugin for WordPress now!

It is built on Bootstrap3 Framework and is based on latest HTML5 for a robust and fast site. Its interesting design is perfect for any site type.

  • Coming Soon Pro – Live Demos
  • Upgrade To Coming Soon Pro Now

It features a full screen slide show and multi-page content from one screen. The look stands out and will remain memorable to all of your visitors.

Features Of Plugin

  • Responsive Design
  • Clean Retina
  • Build with Bootstrap 3.3.4
  • Works with any WordPress Theme
  • Css3 Animations
  • Html5 Supported
  • SEO friendly
  • Single image background
  • 5 Slideshow background
  • Unlimited color Scheme
  • Wp mail newsletter integrated
  • About us page section
  • Contact Info Page section
  • Countdown Timer
  • FontAwesome icon font
  • 2+ Additional Content pages
  • 5+ Social networks integrated
  • Flexible and user-friendly setup
  • Live Preview option
  • Clean and well documented
  • Translation Ready, i18n Support
  • Easy disable the section that you do not need
  • All Browser compatible

Plugin Settings

Logo Settings – You can update coming soon page logo setting easily from panel, also you can change size (width-Height). Upload your jpg png logo and them save your settings.

Coming Soon Page Title/Headline – Add your coming soon page title to represent your website brand headline like when you will site will be live here some ex. “launching soon ” or “under construction” or “Coming Soon”.

Coming Soon Page Description – Describe about your website or about service with help of this field. you can also add HTML tags here.

Coming Soon Page Background – Here you can change your page background , if you want to display color at background or want to add background image.

Text And Color – Update any kind of font color you can update font size, font style etc you can update.

Custom Css – If you want to design coming page with your own style then with help of custom css field you can redesign coming soon page.

Social Profile – Links your social profile accounts with your coming soon page easily Facbeook,Google+, Twitter, Linkedin etc you can lined any account with your website comings soon page. So easily socialize your coming soon page and target your audience on social profiles.

Contacts Info – Add your phone number, email id , address on your coming soon page using contact info panel setting.

**Newsletter Subscription ** – Join your customer with your website add subscriber field, you can receive email while your user hit there.

CHECK MORE PLUGINS BY WPSHOPMART

  • Counter Numbers
  • Service Box
  • Testimonial Builder
  • Team Builder

Coming Soon Pro Features

  • Responsive Design

  • 8 Designs Templates
  • 7+ Newsletter Option
  • 4+ Additional Pages

  • Mailchimp Newsletter Integrated
  • Madmimi Newsletter Integrated
  • Icontact Newsletter Integrated
  • Constant Contact Newsletter Integrated
  • Campaign Monitor Newsletter Integrated
  • GetResponse Newsletter Integrated

Pro Version Live Demo

  • Template1 With Background Slideshow

  • Template7 With YouTube Video Background
  • Template8 With Background Static Image
  • Template8 With Background Slideshow
  • Template8 With YouTube Video Background

Each of the versions of the tab made in a certain style according to your preference and related to your web site. Rich Tabbed plugin is a true miracle.

If you wish to spice up your corporate website, blog, ecommerce site or a message board, with Tabbed its easy to show any content, video, price or data tables, form or other elements.

Check Demos

  • Coming Soon Pro – Live Demos
  • Upgrade To Coming Soon Pro

Responsive Design

Responsive Coming Soon plugin is provide you a fully responsive template and will look fine, regardless of the device it is viewed on (desktops, tablets and smartphones). We integrated a smart sizing engine for a perfect display of theme in all window sizes.

Retina Ready

Template owns a pixel-perfect design and is coded with the highest quality of graphics. Its fonts and texts become eye candy for every customer.

Awesome Animation

Responsive Coming soon is implemented with latest css 3 animation , animations are very creative.

2 Additional Content Pages.

this plugin is Comes with two additional content pages – About Us (here you can describe your company’s activity o) and Contact Info (consists of your contact information).

Countdown Timer

The countdown timer counts down in seconds, minutes, hours and days to any date and informs your customers about the website release. Easy to set up and allows you to set you own date for countdown script.

Background Slideshow

We have added Image Background, Slideshow Background in this plugin , you can add 5 slideshow images for your background

Translators

Please contribute to translate our plugin. Contact at wpshopmart(at)gmail(dot)com.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire responsive-coming-soon folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to Responsive Coming Soon Panels menu to customize this plugin.
  4. Finally Enjoy it.
sections.faq:
coming soon page is not displayed?

Check that you coming soon mode is enabled from setting, if coming soon is not enable then enabled it. Now open a new browser where you are not logged in. Open your site url in this new browser.

coming soon enabled but i can’t see the coming soon page

If you are using any cache plugin then first deactivate it now check your site in different browser.

Having Problem in this plugin?

Submit your ticket here support forum

I Really appreciate your effort on this plugin and now i want to support it !

We love your feedback please submit your review here pluigns review

sections.reviews:
Gets the job done!

By graichura on January 25, 2024

Straight forward to implement and works like a charm. Fast support also, which is great.

Just what I needed

By smarxer on December 10, 2023

Perfect for coming soon page. You can use--or not--the different sections and add your own photos. My old favorite plug-in got way too bloated and wanted to take over my site as well. This one does what I need. Simply.

Plugin works fine, but there are few drawbacks

By Acnoo (acnoo) on June 3, 2023

The text and logo update takes time to show up on front end. Also, adding this plugin causes all the text on the website to have a drop shadow.

Great plugin

By samuneputty on November 21, 2022

Easy to use

I cant expect better

By kiffa on October 27, 2022

Easy to use and very mobilefriendly

dcwinn

By dcwinn on July 2, 2022

works great

Very Good Plugin

By rosine00 on May 19, 2022

I was able to get it up and running without too much fuss. Great plugin

Easiest way to do a "Coming Soon page"

By epetra on May 15, 2022

Easiest way to do a "Coming Soon page" You have a coming soon page in minutes Excellent

About Us section

By mommaroodle on April 2, 2022

the about us section is not being turned off, after i turn it off

Cool & Excelent

By abuakbar on December 23, 2021

beyond expectations, very satisfied, Thank You Coming soon Plugin
